analysis.description:
Affiliate.indexPaidAffiliate (/unique_chucks/12/0x4e7a37f5c5832a35fea477bafe84b666429a5a36.sol#532-534) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- payAffiliate (/unique_chucks/12/0x4e7a37f5c5832a35fea477bafe84b666429a5a36.sol#873-887)

Bonus.indexPaidBonus (/unique_chucks/12/0x4e7a37f5c5832a35fea477bafe84b666429a5a36.sol#423-427) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- payBonus (/unique_chucks/12/0x4e7a37f5c5832a35fea477bafe84b666429a5a36.sol#904-919)

ERC20BasicToken (/unique_chucks/12/0x4e7a37f5c5832a35fea477bafe84b666429a5a36.sol#133-302) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
